item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Mr Firecape:

talk like a player please.

I don’t believe there is a method in Project Insanity for objects being handled like that considering how many corners were cut during its first release.

c.getPA().startTeleport(3113, 3348, 0, “modern”);
c.sendMessage(“Goodluck!”);
break;
